attributes.action: Radically overhaul the current quota system for Trawler fisherman which results in 1000'a of tonnes of dumped fish every year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.

Please also remove the link to the Guardian.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
